author: VR Gorilla - Virtual Reality & 360 Videos
description:
Chocolate’s story starts deep in the tropical forests, where cacao trees grow and farmers care for them every day. It’s a journey that goes back thousands of years—to the ancient civilizations of South and Central America, who first discovered the magic inside these colorful pods. From there, cacao spread across the globe, finding new homes in Africa, Asia, and beyond. In this short journey, you’ll see how cacao is grown, harvested, and carefully prepared before it ever becomes chocolate. 

Click the *Join* button now to become a VR Gorilla YouTube member, unlocking access to the full video and our complete collection of full-length videos. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6AXBF-78lNa3_TjAIWZWmQ/join

For an unparalleled VR Travel viewing experience, download our "*TriptoVR*" app for your Meta Quest or mobile VR player. Find the app on the *Meta Quest* store here.

https://www.meta.com/experiences/6447684138675693/

Or on the *Pico Global* store here.

https://store-global.picoxr.co
title: The Journey of Cacao - Mini VR Documentary - 8K 360 3D
